ref.div: Iseri Y, Yoshikawa S, Kiguchi M, Tawatari R, Kanae S, Oki T (2018) Toward the incorporation of tipping elements into global climate risk management: probability of passing a threshold and potential impact of a threshold being passed. Sustain Sci. 10.1007/s11625-018-0536-7 (in this issue, accepted)
